front.title: Media Access Control (MAC) Addresses in X.509 Certificates

abstract.t: This document defines a new otherName for inclusion in the X.509 Subject Alternative Name (SAN) extension to carry an IEEE Media Access Control (MAC) address. The new name form makes it possible to bind a layer-2 interface identifier to a public key certificate. This is needed for secure onboarding and key establishment protocols that operate below the network layer, such as IEEE 802.1AE (MACsec).
